name: Cetitan
flavorText: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

previous.name: Cetoddle
previous.flavorText: This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer.

next.name: Veluza
next.flavorText: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.
